title: i need to know the status of my pixel delivery
content:
Its been 2 weeks since i've sent my device for service in b2x servoce centre mumbai,
Still there is no change in status and they do not have a proper customer care number.

even the google support is closed for a good hours every day they show they work from 9am - 9pm and whenever i see it is closed.

need to status of my phone repair service
job no : JOB154798
